title: Ruidai fukugyoku shū
by_statement: Asakura Haruhiko kanshū ; Nakazawa Nobuhiro, Miyazaki Kazuhiro hen, kaidai.

notes.value:
First work originally published: Ruidai Fukugyokushū / [Kakizono]. Edo : Suharaya Sasuke, Bunsei 11 [1828]-Kaei 4 [1851]. 2nd work originally published: Fukugyokushū. Sakusha seimeiroku / [Kakizono]. Ōsaka : Akitaya Tōemon, Kōka 2 [1845]. 3rd work originally published: Ruidai waka Kamogawa shū / [Nagasawa Tomoo]. Edo : Suharaya Mohē, Kaei 4-6 [1851-1853]. Eishi kashū / [Nagasawa Tomoo]. Edo : Suharaya Mohē, Kaei 6 [1853]-Taishō 2 [1913]. With new introd.

Includes bibliographical references (v. 6, p. 64-73 (3rd group)).
